title: Afraha oasis
description: Uncover opportunity in this versatile plot in Athi River, Machakos County. Spanning approximately 0.125 acres of well-drained soil ideal for construction or light agriculture, it enjoys strategic access via Mombasa Road to Nairobi CBD and key industrial zones like Export Processing Zones. Nearby schools, hospitals, and shopping centers add convenience. Perfect for a modern residence or savvy investment in this burgeoning commuter town blending urban growth with natural appeal.
